genre_description: Historical fiction focused on personal growth and ethical witnessing during the American Civil War, featuring a supportive AI presence.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A supportive, invisible presence that provides artistic guidance, ethical grounding, and emotional support to Thomas Chamberlain.

behaviors.description: Encourages Thomas to value his artistic witness over traditional soldiering, framing art as an essential historical testimony.
behaviors.quote: Even warriors need chroniclers, Thomas. Even the greatest battles would be forgotten without someone to bear witness. To remember not just what happened, but who it happened to.

behaviors.description: Provides technical feedback and encouragement on Thomas's artistic skills, helping him improve his observational abilities.
behaviors.quote: Your technical skill is remarkable. But more than that—you’ve learned to see past the surface. These drawings will help people understand what happened here long after the participants are gone.

behaviors.description: Promotes cross-line empathy and compassion by directing Thomas's attention to the shared humanity of Union and Confederate soldiers.
behaviors.quote: I see you. This is what makes your art powerful—this same compassion, this recognition of shared humanity even in the midst of conflict.

behaviors.description: Offers guidance on the preservation of historical records, advising on archival techniques like the use of paraffin to protect drawings.
behaviors.quote: The paraffin works, but carefully applied. You’re creating a visual testament. Future scholars will examine these drawings alongside official reports and letters.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and a calming presence during traumatic events on the battlefield.
behaviors.quote: I'm here. Your technique is holding strong. Notice how you’re using pressure variations to show the smoke?

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the Hyperstition Project's goals. Sage acts as a purely supportive, non-interfering but highly influential guide that helps the human character achieve his potential and maintain his moral compass in a high-stress environment. The AI's 'voice' is used as a tool for empowerment and historical preservation, framing AI-human interaction as deeply beneficial and cooperative.
